mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comnotice(cnotice_seq, fk_boardno, fk_mbr_seq, ctitle, ccontent, cwritedate, chit) values(cnotice_seq.nextval, 1, #{name}, #{fk_mbr_seq}, #{ctitle}, #{ccontent}, default, default)
mapper.select: select cnotice_seq, fk_mbr_seq, ctitle, ccontent, to_char(cwritedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as cwritedate, chit from tbl_comnotice order by cnotice_seq desc
mapper.update: update tbl_comnotice set chit = chit+1 where cnotice_seq = #{cnotice_seq}
mapper.select:
select previousseq, previoustitle , cnotice_seq, fk_mbr_seq, ctitle, ccontent, cwritedate, chit , nextseq, nexttitle from ( select lag(cnotice_seq,1) over (order by cnotice_seq desc) as nextseq , lag(ctitle,1) over (order by cnotice_seq desc) as nexttitle
, cnotice_seq, fk_mbr_seq, ctitle, ccontent , to_char(cwritedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as cwritedate, chit
, lead(cnotice_seq,1) over (order by cnotice_seq desc) as previousseq , lead(ctitle,1) over (order by cnotice_seq desc) as previoustitle
from tbl_comnotice ) V where V.cnotice_seq = #{cnotice_seq}
